description: This file implements a WebRTC manager for a Flutter application, handling peer connections, media streams, and local and remote video rendering.

classes.name: PeerInfo
classes.description: Holds information about a peer connection, including its ID, RTCPeerConnection instance, and associated video renderer.

classes.name: WebRTCManager
classes.description: Main class managing WebRTC peer connections, local media streams, and remote video rendering for a Flutter app.

methods.name: initLocal
methods.description: Initializes local media stream and the local video renderer.

methods.name: _createPeerConnection
methods.description: Creates and configures a new RTCPeerConnection with ICE servers and adds local tracks.

methods.name: addPeer
methods.description: Adds a new peer connection for a given participant, setting up track event handlers.

methods.name: getPeer
methods.description: Retrieves the PeerInfo object for a specific participant.

methods.name: createOffer
methods.description: Creates an SDP offer for a specific peer.

methods.name: createAnswer
methods.description: Creates an SDP answer for a specific peer.

methods.name: setRemoteDescription
methods.description: Sets the remote SDP description for a peer.

methods.name: addCandidate
methods.description: Adds an ICE candidate to a peer connection.

methods.name: toggleMute
methods.description: Mutes or unmutes local audio tracks.

methods.name: toggleCamera
methods.description: Turns the local camera on or off.

methods.name: disposeAll
methods.description: Closes all peer connections, disposes of renderers, and cleans up resources.
